apihelp-query+checkuser-summary: Check which IP addresses are used by a given username or which usernames are used by a given IP address.
apihelp-query+checkuser-paramvalue-reque: Get IP address of target user.
Get actions performed by target IP address or range.
Get users from target IP address or range.
apihelp-query+checkuser-param-target: Username, IP address, or CIDR range to check.
apihelp-query+checkuser-param-timecond: Time limit of user data (like "-2 weeks" or "2 weeks ago").
apihelp-query+checkuser-param-xff: Use XFF data instead of IP address.
apihelp-query+checkuserlog-summary: Get entries from the CheckUser log.
apihelp-query+checkuserlog-param-target: Checked user, IP address, or CIDR range.
apihelp-query+checkuserlog-param-from: The timestamp to start enumerating from.
apihelp-query+checkuserformattedblockinf: Return formatted block details for sitewide blocks affecting the current user.
apihelp-query+globalcontributions-summar: Show most recent edits across all wikis for a given registered user.
apihelp-query+globalcontributions-param-: Username to look up (must not be an IP).
Continuation offset to resume the enumeration from.
apihelp-query+globalcontributions-exampl: Show most recent edits across all wikis for a given user.
Show most recent edits across all wikis for a given user from a given continuation offset, with a custom limit.
apierror-checkuser-missingsummary: You must define reason for check.
apierror-checkuser-timelimit: You need use correct time limit (like "-2 weeks" or "2 weeks ago").
apierror-checkuser-nosuchuser: No such user for this username
checkuser-api-help-paramvalue-direction-: List oldest first. Note: $1from has to be before $1to.
List newest first (default). Note: $1from has to be later than $1to.
checkuser-api-useragent-clienthints-revi: User $1 is not the author of revision $2
checkuser-api-useragent-clienthints-mapp: Client hint mappings already exist for $1 $2
checkuser-api-useragent-clienthints-call: The $1 $2 is too old to allow recording client hints data
checkuser-api-useragent-clienthints-expl: {{SITENAME}} collects user-agent client hint data to assist in moderating vandalism and abuse. See https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:CheckUser/Client_Hints for more details.
apihelp-logout-param-checkuserclienthint: Client hints data supplied alongside requests to ApiLogout. For internal use only.
